full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YUL LHA GZHI BDAG RNAMS LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES YUL LHA GZHI BDAG RNAMS LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU'I ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI YAB YEL DONG HO ZHI CHEN CHE H'O'I THA'I RJES GSUNGS BABS DANG, GZHAN YANG SKYA SER THAMS CAD KYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS BSANGS MCHOG RIN CHEN 'BRENG BA DANG, GZHAN YANG DAM PA MKHA' RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I MCHOD RNAMS LA MI CHUNG BA'I GNAS @007B MED PA'I YOD BZHIN DU BDAG 'DU BAS BMANGS MCHOD RTZOM PA NI, ,MA PAn GYIS, ,'GROD MGON SANGS RGYUS BZHUGS BZHIN DU SNGON PA GZHAN LA GUS BYED PA, ,YAN LAG BRGYAD LDAN CHU 'GRAMS DU, ,BA BTSA'I KHRON PA RKO BA BZHIN, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I DPOR SONG NAMS, ,BSKUL BA PO'I BKA' GYEN LOG MA NUS PA DANG, BSANGS MCHOD MANG PO'I PHYOGS DANG MI 'GAL BA MA GDOGS, ,KHYAD PAR YANG DKAR LA SOGS PA'I GZHI BDAG RNAMS LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL ZHES BSKUL BA YIN, ,DAM PA MKHA' PA RNAMS KYIS ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR LON PA PHYOGS MED BAN CHUNG ^ BLO RGYAL MING BDAG GI TSIG SBYOR SDEBS LEGS MING PA'I 'CHAL GTAM TZAM DU BSGRIGS PA LA, MKHAS GRUB DANG DPYOD @008A *, ,LDAN RNAMS THUGS MI KHREL BZHU, ,GUL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI, ,AER KHE SHE TAR MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS, ,'PHEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
